keyMoments.title: Camie's Introduction
keyMoments.description: Camie formally introduces herself to the Straw Hat Pirates after they saved her from a Sea King, thanking them and mentioning this was the twentieth time she'd been eaten.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Camie to the main story, establishing her as a friendly but trouble-prone mermaid who will become a recurring ally.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you so much for saving me! That was the twentieth time I've been eaten by a Sea King!

keyMoments.title: Reveals Hatchan as Her Friend
keyMoments.description: Camie reveals that her fish-man friend who runs a takoyaki shop has been kidnapped, unknowingly setting up a reunion with a former Arlong Pirates member.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Camie's relationship with Hatchan and creates the motivation for the rescue mission.
keyMoments.quote: My friend runs a takoyaki shop! He's an octopus fish-man!

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Fish Communication
keyMoments.description: Camie uses her mermaid ability to communicate with fish using sonar waves, calling a school of fish to guide them to the Flying Fish Riders' base.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the special abilities mermaids possess in the One Piece world.

abilities.description: As a mermaid, Camie can talk to fish and call out to them using sonar waves.
Mermaids can swim at exceptional speeds underwater, much faster than most other creatures.

relationships.description: Pappag is Camie's pet starfish and fashion design mentor, creating an ironic student-teacher dynamic.

evolutionMoments.description: Pappag introduces himself as Camie's master and companion.

relationships.description: Camie has maintained friendship with Hatchan since he rescued her and Pappag from a sea boar.

evolutionMoments.description: Camie seeks the Straw Hats' help to rescue Hatchan from kidnappers.

reveals.information: Can communicate with fish using sonar waves
Has a habit of being easily shocked and gets into trouble frequently (eaten by Sea Kings 20 times)

keyMoments.title: Pappag's Introduction
keyMoments.description: Pappag, a talking starfish and fashion designer, introduces himself to the amazed Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Pappag as Camie's companion and a unique talking starfish character.

keyMoments.title: Explains the Slave Trade
keyMoments.description: Pappag explains that human trafficking is a booming business near Sabaody Archipelago and that mermaids are particularly valuable.
keyMoments.significance: Provides important world-building information about the dark reality of slavery in the One Piece world.
keyMoments.quote: There are several kidnapping crews in the area and human trading is a booming business in Sabaody. That's why Macro tries to kidnap Camie all the time - mermaids are expensive!

abilities.description: Despite starfish typically lacking voice boxes, Pappag possesses the ability to speak the human language quite fluently.

relationships.description: Pappag serves as Camie's mentor and pet owner, though they maintain a close friendship.

evolutionMoments.description: Pappag is introduced as Camie's companion and master.

reveals.information: Starfish who can speak human language

keyMoments.title: Iron Mask Duval's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Duval appears for the first time wearing his imposing iron mask, declaring he cannot wait to have revenge on 'the man who ruined his life' as the Straw Hats approach.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Duval as a mysterious antagonist with a personal vendetta, creating intrigue about his identity and the reason for his hatred.
keyMoments.quote: The man who ruined my life is approaching... I cannot wait to have my revenge!

relationships.description: Duval harbors intense hatred toward Sanji, blaming him for ruining his life due to their resemblance on Sanji's wanted poster.

evolutionMoments.description: Duval declares his intent to have revenge on 'the man who ruined his life' as the Straw Hats approach.

reveals.information: Wears an imposing iron mask with red hair tufts
Seeks revenge against someone in the Straw Hat crew who 'ruined his life'
Leader of the Flying Fish Riders kidnapping gang

keyMoments.title: Macro Reveals Hatchan's Capture
keyMoments.description: Macro taunts Camie over the Den Den Mushi, revealing he captured Hatchan by teaming up with the Flying Fish Riders and plans to sell him as a slave.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Macro as an antagonist and former Sun Pirates member who now engages in slave trading, betraying his former crew's values.
keyMoments.quote: We finally beat Hatchan! Normally we'd lose, but we teamed up with the Flying Fish Riders this time. I'm gonna sell him - octopus fish-men are rare and worth a fortune!

reveals.information: Slave trader and kidnapper who targets mermaids and fish-men
Former member of the Sun Pirates who left after Jinbe became a Warlord

keyMoments.title: Gyaro's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Gyaro appears as a member of the Macro Gang alongside his captain Macro and crewmate Tansui.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Gyaro as a member of the Macro Pirates and former Sun Pirates crew member.

reveals.information: Member of Macro Pirates and former Sun Pirates crew member

keyMoments.title: Tansui's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Tansui appears as a member of the Macro Gang alongside his captain Macro and crewmate Gyaro.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Tansui as a member of the Macro Pirates and former Sun Pirates crew member.

reveals.information: Member of Macro Pirates and former Sun Pirates crew member
